meanings.sent1: The painting was a pseudos copy, not an original masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pseudos smile to hide her true feelings.
meanings.sent3: His pseudos excuse for being late was that he got stuck in traffic.
meanings.sent4: The pseudos promises of the scammer left many people disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The pseudos gold jewelry turned out to be fake when tested.

meanings.definition: A person who pretends to be someone else.
meanings.sent1: The spy was a pseudos pretending to be a tourist.
meanings.sent2: The actor played the role of a pseudos in the movie.
meanings.sent3: The little boy thought he was a pseudos superhero with special powers.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a pseudos in her new job, trying to fit in with the team.
meanings.sent5: The masked ball was full of pseudos, each hiding their true identity.
